Key Match Events: Defending champions Argentina beat Canada 2-0 in the opening match of the Copa América in Atlanta on Thursday with forwards Julian Alvarez and Lautaro Martinez scoring second-half goals to seal the victory.
Lionel Messi's left-footed shot from outside the box was saved in the top right corner in the 90'+6' minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Messi expressed satisfaction with the 'important' win over Canada.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia, USA, with an attendance of 70,564.
